Calculate the total light absorption of a PAH using the results of the TUV model

Source: R/ptlm.R
p_abs.Rd

Calculate the total light absorption of a PAH using the results of the TUV model

Usage

p_abs(tuv_results, pah, time_multiplier = 2)

Arguments

tuv_results

data.frame of TUV results

pah

name of PAH to calculate light absorption for

time_multiplier

multiplier to get the total exposure time. I.e., if the tuv_results contains 24 hours of data, and you need a 48h exposure, the multiplier would be 2. (this is the default)

Value

The value of Pabs for the TUV results.

On this page
